11:T2837,<h1>OpenClaw Memory Search å®Œå…¨é…ç½®æŒ‡å— - ä½¿ç”¨ Ollama å®ç°æœ¬åœ°å‘é‡æœç´¢</h1>
<blockquote>
<p><strong>å‘å¸ƒæ—¥æœŸ</strong>: 2026-02-28<br>
<strong>æ ‡ç­¾</strong>: #OpenClaw #MemorySearch #Ollama #é…ç½®æŒ‡å— #æœ€ä½³å®è·µ<br>
<strong>åˆ†ç±»</strong>: æŠ€æœ¯æ–‡æ¡£</p>
</blockquote>
<hr>
<h2>ğŸ“‹ ç›®å½•</h2>
<ol>
<li><a href="#%E9%97%AE%E9%A2%98%E8%83%8C%E6%99%AF">é—®é¢˜èƒŒæ™¯</a></li>
<li><a href="#%E6%AD%A3%E7%A1%AE%E9%85%8D%E7%BD%AE%E6%96%B9%E6%A1%88">æ­£ç¡®é…ç½®æ–¹æ¡ˆ</a></li>
<li><a href="#%E5%89%8D%E7%BD%AE%E6%9D%A1%E4%BB%B6">å‰ç½®æ¡ä»¶</a></li>
<li><a href="#%E9%85%8D%E7%BD%AE%E6%AD%A5%E9%AA%A4">é…ç½®æ­¥éª¤</a></li>
<li><a href="#%E9%AA%8C%E8%AF%81%E4%B8%8E%E6%B5%8B%E8%AF%95">éªŒè¯ä¸æµ‹è¯•</a></li>
<li><a href="#%E9%94%99%E8%AF%AF%E9%85%8D%E7%BD%AE%E9%81%BF%E5%9D%91">é”™è¯¯é…ç½®é¿å‘</a></li>
<li><a href="#%E6%80%A7%E8%83%BD%E5%AF%B9%E6%AF%94">æ€§èƒ½å¯¹æ¯”</a></li>
<li><a href="#%E5%B8%B8%E8%A7%81%E9%97%AE%E9%A2%98">å¸¸è§é—®é¢˜</a></li>
<li><a href="#%E7%9B%B8%E5%85%B3%E8%B5%84%E6%BA%90">ç›¸å…³èµ„æº</a></li>
</ol>
<hr>
<h2>é—®é¢˜èƒŒæ™¯</h2>
<p><strong>Memory Search</strong> æ˜¯ OpenClaw çš„é•¿æœŸè®°å¿†åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œé€šè¿‡å‘é‡åµŒå…¥ï¼ˆEmbeddingï¼‰å®ç°è¯­ä¹‰æœç´¢ã€‚å®ƒçš„å·¥ä½œåŸç†æ˜¯ï¼š</p>
<ol>
<li>å°† Markdown è®°å¿†æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆ<code>MEMORY.md</code> + <code>memory/*.md</code>ï¼‰åˆ‡åˆ†æˆ chunks</li>
<li>ä½¿ç”¨ Embedding æ¨¡å‹ç”Ÿæˆå‘é‡</li>
<li>å­˜å‚¨åˆ° SQLite + sqlite-vec å‘é‡æ•°æ®åº“</li>
<li>æœç´¢æ—¶è®¡ç®—æŸ¥è¯¢å‘é‡ä¸å­˜å‚¨å‘é‡çš„ç›¸ä¼¼åº¦</li>
</ol>
<h3>ğŸ”´ å·²çŸ¥é—®é¢˜</h3>
<p>OpenClaw é»˜è®¤çš„ <code>local</code> provider å­˜åœ¨<strong>å¹¶å‘åˆå§‹åŒ– bug</strong>ï¼ˆ<a href="https://github.com/openclaw/openclaw/issues/15639">Issue #15639</a>ï¼‰ï¼š</p>
<pre><code>âŒ ç—‡çŠ¶ï¼šmemory_search æŸ¥è¯¢è¶…æ—¶ 300 ç§’
âŒ åŸå› ï¼šå¹¶å‘è°ƒç”¨ ensureContext() å¯¼è‡´æ¨¡å‹é‡å¤åŠ è½½
âŒ çŠ¶æ€ï¼šOpen (æœªä¿®å¤)
</code></pre>
<p>å› æ­¤ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦æ‰¾åˆ°ä¸€ç§ç¨³å®šå¯é çš„æ›¿ä»£æ–¹æ¡ˆã€‚</p>
<hr>
<h2>æ­£ç¡®é…ç½®æ–¹æ¡ˆ</h2>
<h3>âœ… æ¨èé…ç½®ï¼ˆé€šè¿‡ Ollamaï¼‰</h3>
<p>ç¼–è¾‘ <code>~/.openclaw/openclaw.json</code>ï¼š</p>
<pre><code class="language-json5">{
  "agents": {
    "defaults": {
      "memorySearch": {
        "enabled": true,
        "provider": "openai",
        "model": "nomic-embed-text:latest",
        "remote": {
          "baseUrl": "http://localhost:11434/v1/",
          "apiKey": "ollama"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
</code></pre>
<h3>é…ç½®è¯´æ˜</h3>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>å­—æ®µ</th>
<th>å€¼</th>
<th>è¯´æ˜</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td><code>provider</code></td>
<td><code>"openai"</code></td>
<td>ä½¿ç”¨ OpenAI å…¼å®¹ API åè®®</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><code>model</code></td>
<td><code>"nomic-embed-text:latest"</code></td>
<td>Ollama ä¸­çš„ embedding æ¨¡å‹</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><code>remote.baseUrl</code></td>
<td><code>"http://localhost:11434/v1/"</code></td>
<td>Ollama çš„ OpenAI å…¼å®¹ç«¯ç‚¹</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><code>remote.apiKey</code></td>
<td><code>"ollama"</code></td>
<td>ä»»æ„å€¼ï¼ˆOllama ä¸éœ€è¦éªŒè¯ï¼‰</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h3>ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆè¿™æ ·é…ç½®æœ‰æ•ˆï¼Ÿ</h3>
<ol>
<li>âœ… é€šè¿‡ HTTP API è°ƒç”¨ Ollamaï¼Œ<strong>é¿å¼€äº† <code>local</code> provider çš„å¹¶å‘åˆå§‹åŒ– bug</strong></li>
<li>âœ… åˆ©ç”¨ Ollama çš„ OpenAI å…¼å®¹ API (<code>/v1/embeddings</code>)</li>
<li>âœ… æ¨¡å‹å®Œå…¨æœ¬åœ°è¿è¡Œï¼Œæ— éœ€ API è´¹ç”¨</li>
<li>âœ… æ€§èƒ½ä¼˜ç§€ï¼ˆnomic-embed-text å“åº”æ—¶é—´ ~0.45 ç§’ï¼‰</li>
</ol>
<hr>
<h2>å‰ç½®æ¡ä»¶</h2>
<h3>1. å®‰è£… Ollama</h3>
<pre><code class="language-bash"># macOS
brew install ollama

# å¯åŠ¨ Ollamaï¼ˆå¦‚æœæœªè¿è¡Œï¼‰
ollama serve
</code></pre>
<h3>2. æ‹‰å– Embedding æ¨¡å‹</h3>
<pre><code class="language-bash">ollama pull nomic-embed-text:latest
</code></pre>
<h3>3. éªŒè¯æ¨¡å‹</h3>
<pre><code class="language-bash">ollama list | grep embed
# è¾“å‡ºç¤ºä¾‹ï¼š
# nomic-embed-text:latest    0a109f422b47    274 MB    è¿è¡Œä¸­
</code></pre>
<h3>4. æµ‹è¯• Embedding API</h3>
<pre><code class="language-bash">curl -s http://localhost:11434/api/embeddings \
  -d '{"model": "nomic-embed-text:latest", "prompt": "test"}' \
  | jq '{status: (if .embedding then "OK" else "FAIL" end), vector_length: (.embedding | length)}'
# è¾“å‡ºï¼š{"status": "OK", "vector_length": 768}
</code></pre>
<hr>
<h2>é…ç½®æ­¥éª¤</h2>
<h3>æ­¥éª¤ 1ï¼šç¼–è¾‘é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶</h3>
<pre><code class="language-bash">code ~/.openclaw/openclaw.json
# æˆ–
vim ~/.openclaw/openclaw.json
</code></pre>
<h3>æ­¥éª¤ 2ï¼šæ·»åŠ  memorySearch é…ç½®</h3>
<p>åœ¨ <code>agents.defaults</code> ä¸­æ·»åŠ ï¼ˆæˆ–ä¿®æ”¹ï¼‰<code>memorySearch</code> å­—æ®µï¼š</p>
<pre><code class="language-json5">{
  "agents": {
    "defaults": {
      "memorySearch": {
        "enabled": true,
        "provider": "openai",
        "model": "nomic-embed-text:latest",
        "remote": {
          "baseUrl": "http://localhost:11434/v1/",
          "apiKey": "ollama"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
</code></pre>
<h3>æ­¥éª¤ 3ï¼šé‡å¯ Gateway</h3>
<pre><code class="language-bash">openclaw gateway restart
</code></pre>
<h3>æ­¥éª¤ 4ï¼šé‡å»ºç´¢å¼•</h3>
<pre><code class="language-bash">openclaw memory index --verbose
</code></pre>
<hr>
<h2>éªŒè¯ä¸æµ‹è¯•</h2>
<h3>1. æ£€æŸ¥çŠ¶æ€</h3>
<pre><code class="language-bash">openclaw memory status
</code></pre>
<p><strong>æˆåŠŸæ ‡å¿—ï¼š</strong></p>
<pre><code>âœ… Provider: openai (requested: openai)
âœ… Model: nomic-embed-text:latest
âœ… Indexed: 5/5 files Â· 6 chunks
âœ… Vector: ready
âœ… Vector dims: 768
</code></pre>
<p><strong>å¤±è´¥æ ‡å¿—ï¼š</strong></p>
<pre><code>âŒ Provider: none (requested: xxx)
âŒ Model: none
âŒ Indexed: 0/5 files Â· 0 chunks
âŒ Vector: unknown
</code></pre>
<h3>2. æµ‹è¯•æœç´¢</h3>
<pre><code class="language-bash">openclaw memory search "OpenClaw è®°å¿†"
</code></pre>
<p><strong>é¢„æœŸè¾“å‡ºï¼š</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-json">{
  "results": [
    {
      "path": "MEMORY.md",
      "score": 0.42,
      "snippet": "...",
      "citation": "MEMORY.md#L1-L53"
    }
  ],
  "provider": "openai",
  "model": "nomic-embed-text:latest",
  "mode": "hybrid"
}
</code></pre>
<hr>
<h2>é”™è¯¯é…ç½®é¿å‘</h2>
<h3>âŒ é”™è¯¯ 1ï¼šprovider è®¾ä¸º "ollama"</h3>
<pre><code class="language-json5">{
  "memorySearch": {
    "provider": "ollama"  // âŒ OpenClaw ä¸æ”¯æŒæ­¤ provider
  }
}
</code></pre>
<p><strong>ç»“æœ</strong>ï¼šGateway å¯åŠ¨æŠ¥é”™æˆ–é…ç½®è¢«å¿½ç•¥</p>
<h3>âŒ é”™è¯¯ 2ï¼šä½¿ç”¨ local provider</h3>
<pre><code class="language-json5">{
  "memorySearch": {
    "provider": "local",
    "model": "~/.node-llama-cpp/models/embeddinggemma-300m-qat-Q8_0.gguf"
  }
}
</code></pre>
<p><strong>ç»“æœ</strong>ï¼šæŸ¥è¯¢è¶…æ—¶ 300 ç§’ï¼ˆå¹¶å‘åˆå§‹åŒ– bugï¼‰</p>
<h3>âŒ é”™è¯¯ 3ï¼šç¼ºå°‘ remote é…ç½®</h3>
<pre><code class="language-json5">{
  "memorySearch": {
    "provider": "openai",
    "model": "nomic-embed-text:latest"
    // âŒ ç¼ºå°‘ remote é…ç½®ï¼Œä¼šè°ƒç”¨çœŸæ­£çš„ OpenAI API
  }
}
</code></pre>
<p><strong>ç»“æœ</strong>ï¼šéœ€è¦ OpenAI API Keyï¼Œä¸”äº§ç”Ÿè´¹ç”¨</p>
<hr>
<h2>æ€§èƒ½å¯¹æ¯”</h2>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>æ¨¡å‹</th>
<th>å°ºå¯¸</th>
<th>å“åº”æ—¶é—´</th>
<th>å‘é‡ç»´åº¦</th>
<th>æ¨èåº¦</th>
</tr>

<tr>
<td><strong>nomic-embed-text:latest</strong></td>
<td>274 MB</td>

<td>768</td>
<td>â­â­â­â­â­</td>
</tr>
<tr>

<td>â­â­â­</td>
</tr>

<td>768</td>
<td>â­â­</td>
</tr>

<p><strong>æ¨è</strong>ï¼š<code>nomic-embed-text:latest</code> - æœ€å¿«ã€æœ€è½»é‡ã€ä¸“ä¸ºè¯­ä¹‰æœç´¢è®¾è®¡</p>
<hr>
<h2>å¸¸è§é—®é¢˜</h2>
<h3>Q1: ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆé€‰æ‹© <code>provider: "openai"</code> è€Œä¸æ˜¯ <code>"ollama"</code>ï¼Ÿ</h3>
<p><strong>A</strong>: OpenClaw çš„ memorySearch ä¸æ”¯æŒ <code>"ollama"</code> providerã€‚ä½†æ”¯æŒ <code>"openai"</code> provider é…åˆè‡ªå®šä¹‰ <code>remote.baseUrl</code>ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æŒ‡å‘ä»»ä½• OpenAI å…¼å®¹çš„ API ç«¯ç‚¹ï¼ˆåŒ…æ‹¬ Ollamaï¼‰ã€‚</p>
<h3>Q2: éœ€è¦é…ç½® OpenAI API Key å—ï¼Ÿ</h3>
<p><strong>A</strong>: ä¸éœ€è¦ã€‚<code>remote.apiKey</code> å¯ä»¥è®¾ç½®ä¸ºä»»æ„å€¼ï¼ˆå¦‚ <code>"ollama"</code>ï¼‰ï¼Œå› ä¸º Ollama ä¸éªŒè¯ API Keyã€‚</p>
<h3>Q3: å¦‚æœ Ollama æ²¡æœ‰è¿è¡Œä¼šæ€æ ·ï¼Ÿ</h3>
<p><strong>A</strong>: memory search ä¼šå¤±è´¥ã€‚è¯·ç¡®ä¿ Ollama æœåŠ¡æ­£åœ¨è¿è¡Œï¼š</p>
<pre><code class="language-bash">ollama ps  # æ£€æŸ¥è¿è¡ŒçŠ¶æ€
ollama serve  # å¯åŠ¨æœåŠ¡
</code></pre>
<h3>Q4: å¯ä»¥æ›´æ¢å…¶ä»– embedding æ¨¡å‹å—ï¼Ÿ</h3>
<p><strong>A</strong>: å¯ä»¥ã€‚åªéœ€ï¼š</p>
<ol>
<li>æ‹‰å–æ–°æ¨¡å‹ï¼š<code>ollama pull æ¨¡å‹å</code></li>
<li>ä¿®æ”¹é…ç½®ï¼š<code>"model": "æ¨¡å‹å"</code></li>
<li>é‡å»ºç´¢å¼•ï¼š<code>openclaw memory index --force</code></li>
</ol>
<h3>Q5: ç´¢å¼•éœ€è¦å¤šä¹…é‡å»ºä¸€æ¬¡ï¼Ÿ</h3>
<p><strong>A</strong>: OpenClaw ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨ç›‘æ§è®°å¿†æ–‡ä»¶å˜åŒ–å¹¶å¢é‡æ›´æ–°ã€‚æ‰‹åŠ¨å¼ºåˆ¶é‡å»ºï¼š</p>
<pre><code class="language-bash">openclaw memory index --force
</code></pre>
<hr>
<h2>ç›¸å…³èµ„æº</h2>
<ul>
<li><strong>OpenClaw å®˜æ–¹æ–‡æ¡£</strong>: <a href="https://docs.openclaw.ai/concepts/memory">https://docs.openclaw.ai/concepts/memory</a></li>
<li><strong>Issue #15639</strong> (local provider bug): <a href="https://github.com/openclaw/openclaw/issues/15639">https://github.com/openclaw/openclaw/issues/15639</a></li>
<li><strong>Ollama Embedding API</strong>: <a href="https://github.com/ollama/ollama/blob/main/docs/api.md#generate-embeddings">https://github.com/ollama/ollama/blob/main/docs/api.md#generate-embeddings</a></li>
<li><strong>nomic-embed-text æ¨¡å‹</strong>: <a href="https://ollama.com/library/nomic-embed-text">https://ollama.com/library/nomic-embed-text</a></li>
</ul>
<hr>
<h2>æ€»ç»“</h2>
<p>é€šè¿‡ <code>provider: "openai"</code> + <code>remote.baseUrl</code> æŒ‡å‘ Ollamaï¼Œæ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨ OpenClaw Memory Search çš„<strong>æœ€ä½³æ–¹æ¡ˆ</strong>ï¼š</p>
<ul>
<li>âœ… ç¨³å®šå¯é ï¼ˆé¿å¼€ local provider bugï¼‰</li>
<li>âœ… å®Œå…¨æœ¬åœ°ï¼ˆæ— éœ€ API è´¹ç”¨ï¼‰</li>
<li>âœ… æ€§èƒ½ä¼˜ç§€ï¼ˆ0.45 ç§’å“åº”ï¼‰</li>
<li>âœ… é…ç½®ç®€å•ï¼ˆåªéœ€ 4 ä¸ªå­—æ®µï¼‰</li>
</ul>
